author: Jaykul
body:
When looking at a junction, or at items in a junction, the mode is expected to be the same as the original item, but with a `l` appended.

Instead, we're getting `l` in the spot where `d` should be, and thus can't tell the difference between folders and files in a junction.

See Also [REGRESSION: Remove-Item Junction no longer works](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/10747) #10747
See Also [Mode property for Symbolic links and junctions is expected to be...](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/1407) #1407

# Steps to reproduce

```powershell
# Create a junction point
# E.g. Install-Package from the NuGet provider with a `-Destination`
Install-Package YamlDotNet -Destination . -Force -ExcludeVersion # -Provider NuGet -Source https://api.nuget.org/v3/index.json 

# Review the created junction point 
# PowerShell 7 pre 4 initially displays it as a directory, not a junction/link at all
# But if you keep running Get-ChildItem or Get-Item it will eventually notice
Get-ChildItem YamlDotNet*
```

# Expected behavior

It should behave as it does in Windows PowerShell 5, where the "l" is added to the end of the mode, not replacing the directory flag.

```none
> Get-ChildItem .\YamlDotNet

    Directory: C:\Users\joel.bennett\OneDrive - Questionmark Corporation\Documents\PowerShell\Libraries\YamlDotNet


Mode                LastWriteTime         Length Name
----                -------------         ------ ----
da---l        10/9/2019   3:21 PM                lib
-a---l        9/28/2019   9:35 AM           9462 .signature.p7s
-a---l        9/28/2019   4:32 PM           1110 LICENSE.txt
-a---l        10/9/2019   3:21 PM         629245 YamlDotNet.nupkg
```

# Actual behavior

When we look at the contents we can't tell what's a folder and what's a file:

```
> Get-ChildItem YamlDotNet

    Directory: C:\Users\Joel\Documents\PowerShell\Libraries\YamlDotNet

Mode                 LastWriteTime         Length Name
----                 -------------         ------ ----
la---           10/9/2019  3:21 PM                lib
la---           9/28/2019  9:35 AM           9462 .signature.p7s
la---           9/28/2019  4:32 PM           1110 LICENSE.txt
la---           10/9/2019  3:21 PM         629245 YamlDotNet.nupkg
```

Notice that the `lib` directory has the same `la---` mode as the files!

title: Regression: Inconsistent Modes for Junctions
